Text:
Large scale Windows Deployment

Large scale Windows Deployment over local network.
Deploy entire hard drive to unlimited number of PCs.
Deploy a single system image to hundreds of computers.
Designed for Corporate Environment
Fully Automatic Procedure.
Faster Cloning speed, securer data transfer.
Unattended mode, easy to use, timesaving network clone.
Support running on Windows PE 3.0 Boot CD/DVD or USB stick
System requrements:
Windows XP, 2003 Server, Vista, 2008, 7, 8, Server 2008, PE, Windows-X64
Administrative rights to execute PC Network Clone
1+ GB disk space, 50MB+ RAM
